root.name: The Bugs Bunny Crazy Castle II
root.description: OverviewThe Bugs Bunny Crazy Castle II is a Game Boy sequel to the original Bugs Bunny Crazy Castle that appeared on the NES. In the game, the player must guide Bugs Bunny through a maze-like castle belonging to Witch Hazel. As, along the way, the player will have to fight off other members of the Looney Tunes cast to make it to the exit and fight Hazel herself.The game was released in Japan as Mickey Mouse II and in Europe as Hugo.
